question.para: Does dispatcher provide a fair distribution?

answer.para: There is no guarantee of that. You should do some measurements to decide what distribution algorithm fits better in your environment.
No. Dispatcher is stateless, although some distribution algorithms are designed to select same destination for subsequent requests of the same dialog (e.g., hashing the call-id).
